column1: # This CSV file contains sample data for demonstrating D3.js bar chart creation
# - Column 1 (appliance): Category labels for x-axis (text/string values)
# - Column 2 (consumption): Numeric values for y-axis (energy in kWh per month)
# Data Source: Representative household appliance energy consumption values
# Usage: Loaded by tv_chart1.js using d3.csv() for interactive visualization
# Chart Type: Vertical bar chart with hover tooltips and animations
